title: Bloodmoon skin line possible candidates
body: I liked how the blood moon skins turned out but I kinda wished some old champs got some love aswell. For the bloodmoon jhin he had 1 glowing red eye which kind of resembles the Sharingan from Naruto wish they added that to bloodmoon yasuo. But they could of considered trundle to be a bloodmoon candidate for this skin line because his club resembles well.. A spiked club and he weilds something heavy like those heavily armored club weilding samurais would weild and a demon mask fits him him perfectly. Shaco could of been part of this aswell since he has a sinister face and he is a assassin so a demon mask would suit him. But i hope riot thinks about the champs that never gotten skins in a while and gives them something next year
